string.text: Flesh Hide (Transmutated)

Flesh hide imbued with artefacts through the process of transmutation to further enhance their protective properties and increase it's durability.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,0,0] Transmutated
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Upgraded mutant hide
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Enhanced properties
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Additive effects
